page.title: 17Shopping Facilities
page.content: In the whole of the area there is only{one shop,}and this is in Chapel Lane, Rangemore, where most of the houses are situated. When you go into the shop you can tell at once that it{sells almost {everything}that you might want except clothes and furniture. Fresh fruit and vegetables are on display together with tinned, packet and frozen foods, stationery, cards, bread, cakes and other groceries. This shop is also the{Post Office} and is open every weekday from 8.30 a.m. to 6.00 p.m. and on Saturday from 8.30 a.m. to 1.00 p.m. The shop is very old and rather quaint and it is always very busy. People in the area also shop in {Burton}and{Lichfield,}the nearest towns.{Mobile shops}come to the area weekly and sell fish and groceries.
